reviewComments: The malecon is a great place for walking and the marina is convenient. Lots of boats going out and walking distance to restaurants. Nice views of Loreto Bay.
Beautiful & peaceful Malecon. A great view of the bay as you walk along the malecon. This is old time Mexico!
